title: EIM31611 - Deductions from general earnings:where to find instructions

details.body:
The general rule for employees’ expenses is Section 336 ITEPA 2003 and you can find an explanation of the rule at [EIM31630](http://www.hmrc.gov.uk/manuals/eimanual/EIM31630.htm). There is advice at [EIM31622](http://www.hmrc.gov.uk/manuals/eimanual/EIM31622.htm) to show you where to find particular instructions. Some other important legislation that permits deductions is listed below.
